gov.anl.ipns.ViewTools.Components.TwoD.Contour
Class ContourLayoutHandler

java.lang.Object
  gov.anl.ipns.ViewTools.Components.TwoD.Contour.ContourChangeHandler
      gov.anl.ipns.ViewTools.Components.TwoD.Contour.ContourLayoutHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
PropertyChangeHandler, IPreserveState, IAxisAddible, ILogAxisAddible, IOverlayAddible, IZoomAddible, IColorScaleAddible
public class ContourLayoutHandler
extends ContourChangeHandler
implements IAxisAddible, IColorScaleAddible

This is a module of a ContourViewComponent that is responsible for maintaining the layout of the contour image on the view component. That is, this module handles the placement of the contour image, modifies the size of the contour image so that its aspect ratio is preserved if required, and stores state informatino about the layout of the contour image. In addition, the layout and placement of the axes and any readouts around the contour image are maintained by this module.

Constructor Detail

ContourLayoutHandler

public ContourLayoutHandler(PropertyChangeConnector connector,
                            InformationCenter center,
                            ContourJPanel panel,
                            ContourViewComponent component,
                            IVirtualArray2D v2D)
Constructs a module for a ContourViewComponent that handles displaying the view component's contour plot.

Parameters:
connector - Serves to connect several modules of a ContourViewComponent so that if a property in one module is changed, the other modules are notified.
center - Serves as the central location where the data shared between several modules of a ContourViewComponent is stored.
panel - The panel that is responsible for rendering the contour plot.
component - The view component that this module is to maintain.
v2D - The data that is to be displayed by this module.

changeColorScaleLocation

public void changeColorScaleLocation(java.lang.String location)
This method is implemented for the ContourChangeHandler class. This method is invoked if the location of the colorscale's control changes. When invoked, this method updates the layout so that the colorscale's control is in the correct location.

Overrides:
changeColorScaleLocation in class ContourChangeHandler
Parameters:
location - A string alias describing the new location of the colorscale's control. The value of this parameter should be either:
  • CONTROL_PANEL_LOCATION
  • BELOW_IMAGE_LOCATION
  • RIGHT_IMAGE_LOCATION
  • NONE_LOCATION
See Also:
ContourChangeHandler.changeColorScaleLocation(String)

changeAspectRatio

public void changeAspectRatio(boolean preserve)
This method is implemented for the ContourChangeHandler class. If the state of whether or not the aspect ratio should be preserved when rendering the contour plot, this method is invoked. When invoked, the layout of the display is changed so that the contour plot has its apsect ratio either preserved or not preserved (as specified).

Overrides:
changeAspectRatio in class ContourChangeHandler
Parameters:
preserve - True if the aspect ratio should be preserved and false if it shouldn't.
See Also:

public void removeAllActionListeners()
This method is used to remove all of the listeners from the list of listeners that are notified of changes to this module.

kill

public void kill()
This method should be invoked when this display is not needed anymore. This method then invokes the kill() method on every one of this module's transparencies (which are of the type OverlayJPanel).
